sentences.sContent: We have similar tastes in music.
sentences.sCn: 我们对音乐的品位相近。

sentences.sContent: Both approaches seem to achieve similar results.
sentences.sCn: 两种方法都得出了相似的结果。

sentences.sContent: A number of his friends had been affected in a similar way .
sentences.sCn: 他的一些朋友也受到了类似的影响。

sentences.sContent: The two products look quite similar .
sentences.sCn: 这两种产品看上去很相似。

sentences.sContent: ...but similar information is particularly vulnerable to interference...
...the participants' brains behaved in a similar manner seen in birds and dolphins...
...Women struggle to say no in the workplace for similar reasons...
...All the clothes are similar to the space suits designs that kept astronauts comfortable in the temperatures of the moon...
...The findings of the latest research were similar to an earlier multi-state study of assisted living...
...which tracked the effects on Starbucks of a similar calorie-posting law in New York City in 2007...
...If everyone around you has similar views...
...Speakers of English have a similar gesture though the hand may not be cupped and the fingers may be held more loosely...
...Today a similar mortgage would claim more than twice that share of his monthly earnings...
...Universities show similar trends of increased administration personnel and costs without greater learning...
...a divide similar to the gender divide found in the general public...
...Although people around the world may enjoy doing similar things in their free time...
...affect the signaling of hormones and damage the liver — outcomes that sound suspiciously similar to what can happen after a person drinks too much alcohol...
...by understanding why we acted as we did and then exploring ways to avoid similar problems in the future...
...Harvard Medical School describes how all kinds of social networks have similar effects...
...Many of us have had similar encounters with behaviors we perceive as different...
...he made a similar decision three years ago...

phrases.pCn: 相似图形；相似形（similar figure的复数）

remMethod.val: simil(相类似) ＋ ar → 相似的
